content.raw:
I've fixed both problems in 6f9c6e2 which lives at branch issue_240_fix_tests. @gerkey please, give it a look and if it seems sane, feel free to merge.

Basic functionality, enable/disable services on presence of VRC_CHEATS_ENABLED is working as expected for me in vrc 1 world.
